\[

```excel

```

### B. Seasonal totals  
```excel
Summer_Total_kWh   = =SUM(I:I)
Winter_Total_kWh   = =SUM(J:J)

Winter_Night_kWh   = =SUMIFS(J:J, F:F, "Yes")

```
